resetPasswordPage.firstPageInstructions: Enter your email to reset your password!
resetPasswordPage.checkYourEmail: If your email exist we will send you a link! Please, check your mail box!

signForm.signInSubtitle: Log in to get the better opportunities for your project or career.
signForm.title: FREELANCER
signForm.subtitle: Making sure you get hired by the best company. We help you to grow your business and find your perfect job match.
signForm.signUpSubtitle: Register to get the better opportunities for your project or career.

recoverPassForm.enterEmail: Enter you registered e-mail and we'll send you instructions on how to reset your password.
recoverPassForm.title: PASSWORD RECOVERY
recoverPassForm.subtitle: Follow the next steps to get access to your account and the better opportunities for your project or career.
recoverPassForm.enterPassword: Enter your new password and confirm, please.
recoverPassForm.validationEmailMessage: Email must be such view email@domain.com
recoverPassForm.validationMinChar: Has to be at least 6 characters
recoverPassForm.errorMessageWrongEmail: User with this email does not exist
recoverPassForm.errorMessageExpiredLinkTitle: Your link has broken or has expired
recoverPassForm.resetSuccess: Your password reset is successfully done! Go to Home Page.

invitationPage.title: You have successfully registered!
invitationPage.subtitle: Check your e-mail and activate your account. After activation, you can begin to find your perfect job match.
